article_metadata.description: FAR-LEFT DEMOCRATS call themselves "progressives" these days, but they're actually reactionaries who favor the few against the many. Here are several of the endless examples. -- Schools. We've known since the early 1980s, when the Education Department released a landmark report on the subject, that American public schools have been providing a [...]
